On ðone feowertegðan dæg þæs monðes bið þæs miclan martyres gemynd se is nemned sanctus Focas.
He wæs biscop on ðære mægðe ðe Pontus is nemned, ac Traianus se casere hine ðreade mid unaseggendlicum witum for Cristes geleafan.
Ond æt nehstan he het hine sendan on byrnendne ofn, ond on ðæm he onsende his gast.

Ond ðrym dagum æfter þæm he æteawde beforan þæs caseres dura ond cleopade to þæm casere ond him sæde þæt him wære hell ontyned ond hire wite gegearwad, ond hine het efstan to þæm, ond þa sona æfter þæm swealt se casere.
Þeosses biscopes reliquias syndon on Galwala mægðe on Mennia ðære ceastre, ond þa reliquias syndon swiðe mære geond middangeard.
On ðone fiftegðan dæg þæs monðes bið sancte Cyrices tid þæs halgan cildes ond sancte Iulittan his modar.
Hi þrowedon swiðe mærne martyrdom for Criste.
Alexander se gerefa het hi gefon on ðære ceastre ðe is nemned Tharso, seo is on Cilicia þære mægðe, ond he ongan hi þreagan mid ondrystlicum witum for Cristes geleafan.
Þa ne mihte he hi hwæþre mid nænge oferswiðan.
Sanctus Cyricus ðæt cild hæfde læsse þonne þry monðas þæs þriddan geares þa hit ærest ðone martyrdom ongonn.
Þa þæt halige cild ongeat þæt heora lifes ende tonealehte, þa bæd hit drihten ond þus cwæð, Drihten God, beo þu gemedemad me to geheranne.
Swa hwilc mon swa me timbreð gebedhus, sele þu mede him on heofonum.

Ond on swa hwelcre stowe swa min gemynd sy mærsad, gemicla þu, Drihten, ofer eorðan þara monna hwæte ond heora win ond heora worldlice spede, ond ne sy on heora stowe gemeted neata cwyld ne adl ne hlafes hungor.
Ne se unclæna gæst leore on ða stowe, ac þær sy soðfæstnes ond rihtwisnes.
Ond gif hwelc mon fæste oþþe <nyhttewæccan> do oþþe his synne wepe on ðæm dæge minre ðrowunge, sele þu ðæm monnum gode mede.
Drihten, gif hwilc mon hæbbe micle scylde, ond he cyme on cyrican ond he þa andette on minum naman, adylga þu, drihten, þæs mannes scylde, ond heo sy hwittra ðonne snaw.
Ond gif hwilc mon wille feran ofer sæs yþe, ond he þonne ne mæge ond he wepende me gecige, gefultuma þu, drihten, him.
Ond gif hwilc mon sy from deofle geswenced, ond he cyme to cyrican ond him þær gebidde on minum noman, sele þu, dryhten, þæm mildheortnesse.
Ond gif hwilc mon owiht bringe to ælmessan to cirican on minum noman, forgif þu þæm mede on worold worlda.
Þa com stefn of heofonum ðus cweþende.
Ic selle minne fultum eallum þæm þe me gecegað þorh ðinne noman.
Ond þa onsende ðæt <cild> his gast to heofonum mid micle <leohte>, ond his modor onsende hire gast noht longe æfter þon, ond heo wunað nu a on ecnesse on godes rice.
On ðone <seofontegðan> dæg þæs monðes bið þæs biscopes tid þæs noma is Sperati.
Se þrowade martyrdom for Criste on Cartagine þære miclan ceastre mid ealle his biscophirede ge mid werum ge mid wifum.
On þone eahtategeþan dæg þæs monðes bið þara wudewan tid sancte Simphorosan, seo þrowade martyrdom for Criste mid hire seofon sunum.
Þara suna naman wæron Crescentes ond Iolianus, Nemesius ond Primitibus, Iustinus ond Sacsius ond Eugenius, æt þara lichoman gewurdon monegu heofonlico wundru.
On ðone nigentegðan dæg þæs monðes bið þære æþelan fæmnan gemynd þære noma wæs Cristina.
Seo wæs on ðære ceastre ðe is nemned Tyro, ond sona swa heo wæs ændlefen geara, þa lufade heo Crist ond on hine gelyfde.

Ða het hire fæder Urbanus hi bewyrcean on anum torre mid twelf ðeowennum, þæt nænig wer hi scolde geseon butan him anum, ond he het wyrcan gyldeno godgeld ond seolfrene, þæt hio sceolde þa weorðian æfter hæþnum þeawum.
Ða abræc þæt mægden þæt gold ond þæt seolfor of þæm godgeldum ond hit wearp of ðæm torre þearfendum monnum.
Ða yrsode se fæder swiðe forðon, ond he het gebindan þæm mægdene stan on swiran on æfenne ond hi sændan on sæ.
Þa onfengan godes englas hire, ond heo eode mid him ofer þæt wæter.

Þa on midde niht ætywde hire micel mon ond ondyrsnlic gongende ofer þæs sæs yþe, ond he wæs hæbbende brun basone gegyrelan ond wuldorlicne beag on his heafde, ond he cwæþ to hire, Ic eom Crist þone ðu lufast.
Ond he þa dypte hi þriwa on ðære sæ ond cwæð, Cristina, ic þe fullwie on minne god fæder ond on mec, his efenecne sunu, ond on þone halgan gast.
Ond he þa sealde hi sancte Michaele, ond he hi lædde to þære eorðan.
Ond on mergenne, þa hire fæder Urbanus eode to his gerefærne, ða geseah he þæt heo eode bi þæm sæ to þære ceastre.
Ond hwæþre eft heo þurh martyrdom hire gast onsende to god on heofona rice.
On þone ilcan dæg bið þæs fæder tid þe is nemned sanctus Arsenius.
Ðæs þeaw wæs ðæt he wacude ealle niht, ond þonne he nede sceolde slapan on ærnemorgen for þære mænniscan gecynde, þonne cwæþ he to þæm slæpe, cym, þu yfla ðeow.
Ðonne ofereode se slæp hine hwon þær he sæt, ond he sona eft aras.
Cwæþ sum halig biscop, ða he wæs on sawlenga, be þeossum fæder, Arsenius, þu wære eadig, forþon ðu hæfdest a þas tid beforan þinum eagum.
<On> þone an ond twentegþan dæg þæs monðes bið sancte Victores tid þæs martyres ond þreora cempena mid hine.
Þa gelyfdon hi gode þurh þa wundra þe hi æt him gesegon, ond forðon hi wæron ðrowiende mid hine martyrdom.
Heora naman wæron ðeoderius ond Felicianus ond Alexandrus.
Ðæs Victores lichoma resteþ on Massilia ðære ceastre.
On ðone tu ond twentegðan dæg þæs monðes bið sancta Marian tid þære Magdaleniscan.
Seo wæs ærest synnecge, ond heo wæs mid seofon deoflum full, þæt wæs mid eallum uncystum.

Ac heo com to urum drihtne þa he wæs mon on eorðan, þær he wæs æt gereordum on sumes Iudisces leorneres huse, and heo brohte hire alabastrum, þæt is hire glæsfæt, mid deorwyrðe smyrenisse, ond þa weop heo on ðæs hælendes fet ond drigde mid hire loccum ond cyste ond smyrede mid þære deorwyrðan smyrenisse.
Þa cwæþ se hælend to hire, þe syndon þine synna forlætene, ac gang on sibbe.
Ond heo wæs siððan Criste swa gecoren, ðæt he æfter his æriste ærest monna hine hire æteawde, ond heo bodade his ærist his apostolum.
Ond æfter Cristes upastignesse heo wæs on swa micelre longunge æfter him, þæt heo nolde næfre siððan nænge mon geseon.
Ac heo gewat on westenne ond ðær gewunade þritig geara eallum monnum uncuð.

Ne heo næfre æt mænniscne mete ne heo ne dranc, ac æt gehwelcre gebedtide godes englas coman of heofonum ond læddan hi on ða lyft, ond heo þær gehyrde ðære heofonlican wynsumnesse dæl, ond þonne gebrohtan hi eft on hire stanscræfe, ond forðon hi næfre hingrede ne ne þyrste.
Ond þa æfter þrittegum geara gemette <hi> sum halig mæssepreost on ðæm westenne, ond he hi gelædde on his cyrican ond hire husl gesealde.
Ond heo onsænde hire gast to gode, ond se mæssepreost hi bebyrgde, ond micele wundra wæron oft æt hire byrgenne.
On ðone ilcan dæg bið þæs biscopes ðrowung þæs noma wæs sanctus Apollinaris.
Ðone sanctus Petrus self gelærde ond hine to biscope gehalgode ond hine þa gecyste ond hine onsænde to þære byrig þe is nemned Rafenna.
Ond he sona æt fruman gehælde blindne mon, þæt he mihte geseon, ond þurh þæt micel folc he gecyrde to fullwihte.
Ond he stefnde godes cyrican ond godes gesomnunga on þære byrig eahta ond twentig geara, ond þa geþrowade martyrdom for Criste on ðæs caseres dagum þe wæs nemned Vespassianus.
On ðone fif ond twentegðan dæg þæs monðes bið þæs apostoles gemynd ond þæs godes ærendwreocan sancte Iacobes, se ealra þara apostola ærest geþrowade for Criste.

Ðes Iacobus wæs þæs ealdan fæder sunu se Zebedæg wæs haten, ond he wæs Iohannes broðor þæs godspelleres ond he wæs fiscere ærest, ac he þa forlet þa nett ond his fæder mid scipe on sæ þa hine Crist to him cegde of sæs ofre, ond he wæs Criste se leofesta ðegn to sancte Petre ond Iohanne his breþer.
Þes Iacobus ærest monna Hispanius ða elreordegan þeode ða syndon on middangeardes westdæle neah þære sunnan setlgonge he hi gelærde to Cristes geleafan.
Ðone Iacobum se wælgrimma hyrde acwealde mid sweorde, ac Crist gefremede his gast to þæm heofonlican heanessum.
On ðone seofon ond twentegþan dæg þæs monðes bið þæs miclan muneces geleornes sancte Symeones.
Þa he wæs ðreottene geara cniht, þa læswede he mid his fæder sceapum ond þa heold.
Ða geseah he sume godes cyrican.
Þa forlet he þa sceap ond arn to þære godes ciricean.
Þa geherde he þær rædan godes bec.
Þa frægn he ænne ealdne mon hwæt þæt wære.
Þa cwæþ se ealda mann, Hit is monna sawla gestreon ond þa þeawas ðe mon sceal on mynstre healdan.
Ða eode sona of þære cirican to sumes haliges abbodes mynstre, se wæs on noman Timotheus, ond læg fif dagas beforan ðæs mynstres geate, swa he ne æt ne ne dranc, ac he bæd ingonges.
Þa underfeng se abbod hine on þæt mynster.

Ða geleornede he his saltere on feower monðum, ond sona he lifde on swa heardum life for gode þæt þa broðor þæs mynstres cwædon to þæm abbode, To hwon gelæddest þu þysne mon to us, forðon ne magon we aræfnan his hearde þeawas?
Þa gewat he of þæm mynstre deagollice on sume dune, ond he stod þær on drygum stane ðreo gear.
Ealra geara he stod on ðæm westenne seofon ond feowertig.
Sume geare him bærst micel wund on oþrum þeo, ond he stod þurh eallne þone gear on anum fet.
Ond he dyde monig heofonlic wundor, ða sendon ealle swiðe lange to areccanne, ond nu gyt eastdæles men swergiað þurh his noman, ond ne geþristlæcað hi o þæt hi manswergen on his noman.
On ðone eahta ond twentigðan dæg þæs monðes bið þæs martyres gemynd sancte Nazari ond his cnihtes þæs noma wæs sancte Celsi.
Ða sum dema het weorpan on sæ, forþon þe hi noldon forlætan Cristes geleafan.
Þa eodon hi ofer þæt wæter swa hi eodan on dryge eorðan, ond hi deodon moni oþer wundor, ond heora lichoman restað on þære byrig Mediolana.
On ðone nigen ond twentegðan dæg þæs monðes bið þæs biscopes gemynd ond his geleornis þe is nemned sanctus Lupus.

Se wæs ærest on læwdum hade geseted, ond he wæs seofan gear on gesinscipe geseted ær his biscopdome, ond he wæs eft on his biscopdome on swa micelre fullfremednesse þæt he hælde laman mid his gebedum ond dumbe mæn ond sweltendum monnum heora lif geedneowade.
Ond he self lifde on gneaðum woroldlife for gode.
An tunece wæs his gegerela, ond þæt wæs hæren, ond beren hlaf wæs his gereorde, ond þæt hwilum ymb twa niht.
Ac he a wunode on wependum gebedum ond mid ælmessum him ceapode eces rices.
Ðæs biscopes lichoma resteþ on Trecassina ðære byrig, þæt is on ure geþeode æt Triticum.
On ðone ðritegðan dæg ðæs monðes bið þara æþelra wera tid Abdo ond Sennes, þæt wæron twegen cristne ealdormenn on Perscwara mægðe.
Þa het Decius se casere hi gebindan, forðon þe hi on Crist gelefdon, ond he het hi lædan to Rome ond þær deoflum geldan.
Þa hi þæt noldon, þa het he hi nacode sendan on wildra deora geweald.
Þa weop eall Romana dugoð for þære dæde, forþon þa weras wæron wlitige ond fægres lichoman.
Ða noldon þa wildan deor him onhrinan for godes ege, ac þurh oþerne martyrdom hi heora lif geendedon ond hira lichoman restað on Rome.
Ðonne se monað biþ <geendod> þe we nemnað se æftera liþa, þonne bið seo niht VIII tida lang, ond se dæg XVI tida.
On ðam eahtoþan monþe on geare biþ an XXXI daga.
Þone monaþ mon nemneð on leden Agustus monaþ.
Romana duguð hine nemde æryst þy noman, forþon ðy ærestan dæge þæs monþes he getrymede Romana cynedom ond oferswiþde þa þe ær ðæt towurpon.
Ond on ure geþeode we nemnaþ þone monaþ weodmoniaþ, forþon þe hi on þam monþe mæst geweaxaþ.
On þone ærestan dæg þæs monþes biþ ðara martyra tid þe we nemnaþ Machabeos.
Þæt wæron VII gebroþor ond heora modor, ða geþrowedon deaþ for þære ealdan æ bebode ær Cristes acennednysse.
Antiochus, se oferhydiga cyning, nydde hi þæt hi æten swynen flæsc.
Þæt wæs Godes folce forboden on þære ealdan æ, ac hit Crist eft geclænsode þurh his tocyme.
Þa hi þa þæt ne geþafedon, þa het he æghwylcne æfter oþrum acwellan ondryslicum witum.
Þa hyra syxe wæron acwealde beforan þære meder, ða cwæþ heo, Nat ic hu ge ætywdon on minum innoþe.
Ne forgeaf ic eow gast ne lif, ac middangeardes scyppend, se eow agyfþ eft gast ond lif mid mildheortnesse on domes dæge.
Ða gyt wæs se gingesta to laue.
Þa swor se cyning þæm þæt he wolde hyne weligne gedon, gyf he hyne wolde oncyrran from godes æ.
Ða onhylde seo modor hig to þæm to þam cnihte, ond cwæþ, Sunu min, myltsa me ond onfoh deaþe þæt ðu si efenmedome þinum broþrum.
Þa cwæþ se cniht to þam cyninge, Ic sylle mine sauwle ond minne lichoman for ussa fædera ðeodscipe, swa mine broþor dydon.
Ða het se cing þone hyra ealra grimlicost acwellan ond þa modor ealra neahst.
Ond þa sona æfter þon ða gefeol hine se ofermodiga cyning of his scride.
Þa afulode he sona, swa þæt nænig mon ne meahte aræfnan þone stenc ne furðon he sylua.
Ac he aweol eal wyrmum ond earmlice swealt on elðeodigum muntum.
Se wæs ær swa oferhydig þæt him wæs gesewen þæt he meahte on scipe liþan on eorðan ond mid his fotum gangan on wid sæ ond mid his handum gerecean heofenes tungol.
On ðone ylcan dæg bið sancte Germanus geleornys þæs bisceopes, se com on ðas Bretene ofer sæ on Brytwala dagum.
Ond he dyde her monegu wundor ge on se ge on eorþan, ond his dæda syndon awritene ealle mid endebyrdnysse on Ongelcynnes bocum.
On þam ylcan dæge byð þæs biscopes tid sancti Eusebii.
He wes þære burge bisceop Vercellensis, ond him wæs on swefne geywed hwylce dæge he sceolde to Criste geleoran.
He seah on slæpe þæt he on flyhte wære on þam Kalendas dæge Augustus, þæt ys on þone dæg æt <hlafsenunga>, ond he þa gefleah on swiþe heage dune.
Þæt swefn him tacnode þy ylcan dæge þæt hit sceolde beon his lifes ende þurh martyrdom, ond hys gast gefleogan to heofena heahnysse.
On þone æfteran dæg ðæs monþes biþ sancte Stefanus ðrowung þæs papan.
He wæs gemartyrud on Valerianus tidum þæs caseres, ond his lichoma bebyrged in Calestis mynstre æt Rome.
Þes papa gesette þæt mæssepreostas ond diaconas ne sceoldon brucan gehalgodra mæssehrægla to nænegum woroldbroce ne no buton on cyrcean anre.
On ðone ylcan dæg byþ ðære wydewan ðrowung mid hyre þrym sunum þære nama ys Theodota, ond hyre yldesta sunu is <nemned> sanctus Euodius.
Hi wæron in ðære mægþe Biþinia ond in ðære byrig seo is nemned Necia.
Ðære burge ealdorman, se wæs on naman Nicetius, he het sumne scandfulne man, se wes on noman Hirtacus, bysmrian ða halgan wydewan mid hys fyrenlustum.
Ða he hyre nealæhte, þa stod hyre big iong man fæger mid gyldenum hræglum gegyred.
Þæt wæs godes engel, se hine sloh mid his fyste on þæt næsþyrl þæt ðær ut fleow geendode hyre lif mid hyre þrym sunum.
On ðone þryddan dæg þæs monþes byþ mærsod sancte Stephanes lichoman gemetnes ðæs ærestan martyres.
Se wæs gemeted þurh sumne mæssepreost, se wæs on naman Lucianus.
Se wæs sume frigeniht in ciricean.

Þa on þa þriddan tid ðære nihte ætywde him Gamalielus gast healfslæpendum ond him þriwa onhran mid gyldynre gyrde ond him to cwæþ, Luciane, Luciane, Luciane, gang saga þisum bisceope in Ierusalem þæt he do Stehpanus lichoman up of eorþan.
Saga him þæt he ys on XX milum from Hierusalem neah þam tune þe ys nemned Cafarcanialam on þam londe þe is cweden Lagabra.
Þa sæde se mæssepreost þæt ðam bisceope.
Ða sende se bisceop hine ond oþre halige weras mid him.
Þa dulfon hi in þere ylcan stowe, ða gemetton hi stan mid eorðan bewrigenne, þa wæs on þam awriten, Her ys se godes Stehpanus.
Þa segdon hi þæt ðam bisceope, ða com he ðider mid oþrum halgum bisceopum.
Þa ontyndon hi þa þruh, ða com þær ut micelre wynsumnysse stenc, ond monige untrume men þær wæron sona hale gewordene.
Ða gelæddon hi ðone lichoman in Hierusalem.
Hit wes ær þær singal druwung, ond sona æfter þam com geþuhtsum ren on eorþan.
On ðone Van dæg þæs monþes biþ sancti Oswaldes tid, þæs cristinan kyninges, se ricsode VIIII gear in Bretene, ond him sealde god mare rice þonne ænigum hys foregengum.
Him wæron underðeodde ðaIIIIþeoda þe syndon on Bretene, þæt syndon Brytwalas ond Peohtas ond Scottas ond Ongle.
Oswald endade his lif in gebedes wordum ða hine mon sloh, ond þa he feol on eorþan, þa cwæð he,Deus miserere animabus.
He cwæð, God, miltsa þu saulum.

His handa siondan ungebrosnode in þære cynelican ceastre seo ys nemned Bebbanburh, ond his heafod wæs gelæded to Lindesfeare ea, ond se lichoma ys elles in Lindesse mægþe æt Beardanegge, ond his wundor wæron miclo ge beheonan sæ ge begeondan.
On þone VIan dæg ðæs monþes bið sancti Sixtes þrowung þæs papan in Rome mid his VI deaconum.
Þone Syxtum nedde Decius se casere Tiges deofolgylde.
Þa cwæð he to þam deofulgilde, Towyrpe þe Crist.
Ða sona gefeol þæs deofolgyldes huses sum dæl.
Þa het se casere hine gemartyrian mid his deaconum, ond his lichoma resteþ in þam mynstre Calesti, ond his deaconas in þam <mynstre> Pretextate.
On ðone VII dæg þæs monþes bið þæs bisceopes þreowung sancti Donati ond þæs muneces mid him sancti Hilarini.
He wæs bisceop in þære ceastre Awritensi, ond ða he ærestan siðe mæssan sang, þa eodon þa hæþenan weras in to þære cirican ond toslogon his glæsenne calic.
Þa gesomnode se bissceop þa brocu ond him to drihtne gebæd.
Ða wæs se calic eft swa gehal swa he ær wæs, ond þy ilcan dæge for þy wundre þær onfeng fulwihteCCmonna ondXIVmonna.

On þone VIIIan dæg þæs monþes bið sancta Affran þrowung ond hire <modor> mid hire, þære noma wæs sancta Hilaia, ond hire þreo ðeowena, þa wæron on naman sancta Digna ond sancta Eonomina ond sancta Eotropia.
Sio Affra wæs ærest forlegorwif mid hire þeowenum, hio ða eft þeah gelyfde gode ond fulwihte onfeng þurh ða wundor ðe ðe heo geseah æt þam bisceope sanctus Narcisus.
Ac se deoma Gaius mid witum heo ongon æft nedan to hæþenscipe ond cwæð hire to, þu eart meretrix, ðæt is forlegoswif, forðon þu eart <fræmde> from þara cristenra manna gode.
Ða cwæþ sancta Affra, Crist self sægde þæt he for ðam synfullum monnum astige of heofenum on eorþan.
Ða het se dema hi nacode gebindan to anum stenge ond hi bærnan mid fyre, ond heo þæs dyde gode þanccunga ond hire gast onsende.
Ond cristene men gemitton hire lichoman gesundne æfter þam fyre ond hine bebyrgdon on þære æfteran mile fram þære ceastre þe is nemned Augusta.
On ðone VIIIIan dæg þæs monþes bið þæs cempan tid se is nemned sanctus Romanus.
Se gelifde forþon ðe he geseah Godes engel stondan ond drygan mid sceatan Sancti Laurentius limu, þa Decius se casere hine het stingan mid irenum gyrdum tyndehtum.
Ond he ða onfeng fulwihte ond geþrowode martyrdom for Criste, ond his lichoma is bebyrged æt Rome on ðam londe Veranum.

On ðone Xan dæg þæs monþes bið sancti Laurentius þæs archidiacones se sealde monegum blindum men gesiðþe, ond he gedælde eal ða goldhord þa ðe wæron in Godes cyricum æt Rome ðearfendum monnum ond elðeodegum.
Ond þa forþon Decius se hæðena kasere hine tintregode mid unasecgendlicum witum.
Ond æt nehstan he hine het aþenian on irenum bedde ond hine cwicne hirstan ond brædan, ond swa hine mon ma hirste, swa wæs he fægera on ondwlitan.
Ond þa onhof Laurentius his egan up ond cwæð to þam kasere, Geseoh nu, þu earma, et nu þas sidan þe her gehirsted is ond acer me on þa oþre.
Ond þa dyde he gode þoncunga ond his gast onsende to heofnum.
Ond on æfentid Iustinus se mæssepreost ond Ypolitus, se cristena tungerefa, unrote ond wepende hi byrgdon his lichoman on þan lande Veranum on þam wege þe hi nemnað æt Rome Tiburtina.
On ðone XIan dæg þæs monþes bið þæs halgan weres gemind sancti Tiburtii.

Se wæs in Rome, ond swiþe late he wolde onfon Cristes gelefan ond fulwihte ond deofolgyld forlætan, ac þurh wundor þe he seah Sebastianum don he onfeng fulwihte, ond Sebastianus him onfeng æt fulwihte.
Ond he wæs siðþan swa fulfremed in Godes gelefan <ðæt>, gif he song his credon oððe paternoster on untrumne mon, he wæs sona hal.
Ac þa wæs sum swiðe facenful mon in Rome, se wæs in noman Torquatris se geypte hæþenum deman þæt þæs Tiburtius wæs cristen, ond he wæs befangen in ciricean æt his gebede ond to martyrdome gelæded.
On ðone XIIan dæg þæs monþes bið sancti Euplis þrowung.
Se bær Criþes godspel in fodre ofer his sculdrum swa hwæder swa he eode.
Ond he þa com in þa ceastre þe is nemned Catinentia ond he eode in þæt domern ðær ðær Caluisianus wæs in miclum gemote mid hæðefolce.
Þa untynde Eplius þæt Cristes godspel, ond sæde þam folce hwæt þa halgan godspelleras feowere sægdon be ðam ondryslican Godes dome.
Ond þa forþon yrsode se dema ond het hine beheafdian.
Ond þa he wæs læded to þære þrowunge, þa ontynde se heofon, ond he geseah urne dryhten in his þrymme.
On ðone XIIIan dæg þæs monþes bið þæs þroweres gemynd sancti Ypoliti.
Se was tungerefa on Rome, ac he gelyfde gode þurh þa <wundor> þe he geseah æt sancti Laurentie þam deacone, ond he onfeng fulwihte ond ealle his þeowas gefreode.
Ða het Ualerianus, Decies prafest þæs caseres, gebindan ðysne Ypolitum on wildu hors þæt hyne drogon on gorstas ond on þornas.
Ond þa gebæd he him to drihtne ond onsende his gast, ond ða hors forleton ðone lichoman.
Ond þa ymbe medmicelne fyrst æfter þam swealt Valerianus se prauost, ond ærþan he swulte he clypode ond cwæþ, Eala, Laurentius, þæt ðu me gebundenne mid fyrenum racenteagum tyhst in ece fyr.
Ond Decius se kasere awedde.
Ond he clypode ær he swulte, eala, Yppolitus, þæt ðu me grimlice lædest gebundenne in forwyrd.
On ðone ylcan dæg byþ þæs martyres tid sancti Casiani, se wes lareow geongra manna in godes æ.
Ac þa com þær sum hæþen kasere, þa alyfde se þam cnihtum þæt hi hyne ofslogen mid heora writbredum ond hine ofsticodon mid hira writeyrenum.
Ond his þrowung wæs þe lengre ond þy heardre þy þe hyra handa <wæron> unstrange hine to acwellanne.
On þone XVan dæg þæs monþys biþ seo tid þæt is sancta Marian tid.
On þone dæg heo geleorde of middangearde to Criste, ond heo nu scineþ on þam heofonlican mægene betwyh þa þreatas haligra fæmnena, swa swa sunne scineþ on þisne middangeard.
Englas þær blissiaþ, ond heahenglas þær wynsumiaþ, ond ealle þa halgan þær gefeoþ in sancta Marian.
Sancta Maria wæs onlxiiiium<geara> <þa> <ða> <heo> <ferde> <to> <Criste>;  Sancta Maria is godfæder snoru ond godes suna <modur> ond haligra sauwla sweger ond seo æþele cwen þara uplica cesterwara.
Seo stondeþ on þa swyþran healfe ðæs heahfæder ond ðæs heahkyninges.
On ðone XVIIan dæg þæs monðes biþ þæs halgan cnihtes tid sancti Mommos.
Se wæs XII wintre cniht ða he for Criste campode.
He wæs in Cesarea ðære ceastre in Capadocia þære mægþe.
Ða he þær geseah deofolgild begangan, þa gewat he in þone þiccestan wudu, ond him com unrim wildeora þær to ond hine weorþodon.
Ond he lifde be þara wildeora meolcum, ond þonne he his boc rædde, ðonne sæton þa wildeor ymutan hine.
Ða Alexander se gerefa het hyne him to gelædan ond <hine> ðreade mid miclum witum from Cristes geleafan.

Ða he hine swiþost ðreade, ða com þær micel leo, se wæs ær mid þæn cnihte on þam wuda, ond se leo cwæð, Eala, Mommos, þu eart ure hyrde, ic eom nu genyded from godes englum þæt ic for ðe sprece from minre gecynde.
Ond þa abat se leo ðara hæþenra ond ðara Iudea þara ðe hine bysmrodon swa fela ðæt þæt blod arn of þære ylcan stowe swa flod.
Ond þa bebead him se cniht þæt se leo hwurfe eft to his stowe.
Ond þa het se dema hine stænan.
Ða com stefn of heofonum, ond seo cwæþ, Cum, Mommos, heofenas ða synt mid gefean ontynede, ond Crist stondeð æt þam ærestan gete ond ðe gelædeþ in his neorxnawang.
Ond ða onsende sanctus Mommos his gast to gode.
On ðone XVIII dæg þæs monðes biþ ðæs martyres tid on Rome sancti Agapites, ðæs mæssesang mæg gemetan se þe secð on þam niwran sacramentorium, þæt ys on ðam mæssebocum.
On ðone XVIIIIan dæg þæs monðes biþ þæs martyres tid sancti Magni, ðæs sang biþ gemeted on þam yldran mæssebocum.
On þone XXIIan dæg ðæs monþes biþ ðæs weres tid sancti Symforiani, se wæs in <Galwala> mægðe in þære ceastre Augustodonensi.
Se onfeng fulwihte þa he wæs þri geara cniht.
Ða he wæs in werlicre giuguþe, þa nydde hine Heraclius, hæþen ealdorman, þæt he weorðode deofolgyld.
Ða cwæþ he, Ne do ic þæt, forðon þe þeos mennisce tyddernes biþ swa slidende swa glæs.
Þonne hit scinþ ond þonne tobersteð, ac godes wuldor nafaþ nægnigne ende.
Ða bebead se ealdorman þæt hine mon lædde to cwale.
Þa clypode his modor of þam cesterwealle ond cwæþ, Cild, cild, Simforiane, beo nu arod ond ne ondræd þe no þone deað se þe gelædeþ to life.
Loca to þam ðe on heofonum ricsaþ, ne biþ þe no todæg lif afyrred, ac biþ gewenden in þæt betere.
Þu cild, todæg þu leorest to þære upplican eþelnesse.
Ða wæs he beheafdud butan þam wealle, ond he wes on þam felda bebyrged in lytylre cytan ond hwæþre mid heofonlicum mægnum swa gecyþed þæt þa hæþenan selfe hæfdon his wundor on þære mæstan are.
On ðone ylcan dæg byþ ðæs halgan weres gemynd in Rome sancti Timothei, se com from Antiochia þære ceastre to Rome, ond he lærde þær ðæt folc godes geleafan.
Ða Tarquinus ðære burge gerefa for þisum hine het beheafdian.
Ond his lichama is bebyrged neah sancte Paules ciricean þæs apostoles.
Ond se burhgerefa hraþe æfter þam swealt mid arlease deaðe.
On ðone XXVan dæg þæs monþes biþ þæs apostoles tid sancte Bartholomeus.
Se wæs Cristes ærendwreca in India mægþe, seo is ealra eorðena seo ytemyste, ond on oþre healfe ys þystre land, on oþre healfe se sæ Oceanum, þæt is garsecg.
In þisse mægþe he towerp deofolgild ða þe hi ær beeodon, ond þær him com to godes engel ond ætywde þære ðeode hwæt hyra god wæs þe hi ær beeodon.

He him ætywde micelne Sigelhearwan, ðæm wæs seo onsyn sweartre þonne hrum, ond se beard ond þæt feax him wæron oþ þa fet side, ond ða eagan wæron swylce fyren iren, ond sprungon spearcan of þam muðe, ond ful rec him eode of ðæm næsþyrlum, ond he hæfde fiþru swylce þyrnen besma, ond ða handa wæron gebunden tosomne mid fyrenum racentum, ond he hrymde grimlicre stefne ond ladlicre ond fleah aweg ond nahwær siþþan ætywde.
Þæt wæs þæt deofol, þæt seo þeod hyre ær for god beeodon, ond hi nemdon þone Astaroþ.
Ða onfeng ðære þeode kyning fulwihte ond his cwen ond eall ðæt folc þe to his rice belomp.
Þa foron ða hæþnan bisceopas ond ðæt wregdon to ðæs kyninges breþer, se wæs on oþrum kynerice ond he wæs yldra ðonne he.
Þa het se forþon Bartholomeus ðone Cristes þegen cwicne beflean.
Ða com se gelyfeda kyning mid micle folce ond genom his lichaman ond hine þanon alædde mid micle wuldre ond hine gesette in wundorlice micle cyrcean.
Ond se cyng awedde se þe hine cwellan het, ond ealle ða hæþenan bisceopas aweddan ond swulton þa ðe in þære lare wæron.
On ðone ylcan dæg bið þæs martyres tid sancti Genesi.
Se wæs ærest sumes kaseres mima, þæt is leasere, ond sang beforan him scandlicu leoþ ond plegode scandlice plegan.
Ða æt nihstan ða ongan he rædan ða godcundan gewritu ond onfeng fulwihte.
Ða ongan se casere hine eft ðreatian to hæðengylde.
Ða cwæþ he, Ic geseah ða ic fulwihte onfeng ðæt godes engel stod ond hæfde on gewrite ealle ða synna ðe ic æfre ær geworhte.
He þa aþwoh ða ealle ond adwæscte in þæs fulwihtes beþe.
Ða het se kasere hine forþon beheafdian.
On ðone XXVIan dæg ðæs monþes biþ þara martyra tid þe seondon nemned sanctus Heremus, se wæs cægbora in Rome, ond sanctus Habundius.
Hi atugon sumes haliges wifes lichoman of anum adolseaðe ond þone arwyrðlice bebyrgdon.
Ða het Valerianus se refa hi forþon acwellan in þam ylcan adolseaþe.
On ðone XXVIIan dæg þæs monðes biþ ðæs martyres tid sancti Rufi, ðæs mæsse biþ gemeted on ðam yldran mæssebocum.
On ðone XXVIIIan dæg þes monþes biþ miclan weres tid sancti Hermes, se wæs Romeburge gerefa, þa he gelyfde gode þurh ðæs papan lare Alexandres.
Þæt gelomp ðy þe þæs Hermes sunu ongan sweltan.
Þa lædde se fæder ond seo modor hine to eallum heora godgeldum ond bædon his lifes.
Þa wæs he þeah hwæþre dead.
Ða cwæð þæs cnihtes fostormodor to þam fæder, Gyf þu lædde þinne sunu to sancte Petres ciricean to Alexandre ðam papan, þonne hæfdest þu hine gesundne.
Ða genam heo þane deadan cniht ond arn mid to þan papan, ond he hine awehte of deaðe.
Ond Hermes þa sona onfeng fulwihte þy ærestan easterdæge ond his ðeowas mid him, ond ða ealle ærest gefreode.
Þara þeowa wæs ðusend ond twa hund ond fifti.
Ond for ðisum Traianus se kasere sende Aurelianum ðone gesiþ to Rome ond het beheafdian þisne Hermen.
Ond his swustor bebyrgde his lichoman on þæm wege þe æt Rome is nemned Salaria.
On ðone ylcan dæg biþ sanctus Agustinus tid ðæs bisceopes ond þæs æþelan leorneres.
Se wæs on Africa londe, ond he þær his dagas geendode ond he wæs arwyrðlice bebyrged in Sardinia ðære byrig.
Ac þa hergodon þa hæþnan Sarcinware on þa stowe.
Ða forðon Leodbrond, Longbearda kyning, mid micle feo gebohte Agustinus lichoman ond hine gelædde in Ticinan ða burh ond hine þær gesette mid gelimplicre are.
On ðone XXVIIIIan dæg þæs monþes biþ sanctus Iohannes þrowung þæs miclan fulwihteres.
Ðone het Herodes beheafdian, forðon þe he him loh þæt he hæfde his broþor wif him to cifese, ond þæt heafod het beran on disce ond sellan anre sealticgan hire plegan to mede.
Ðæt wæs þære his cifese dohtor, ond seo modor hi þæt ær gelærde.

Forhwon wolde se ælmihtiga god þæt sanctus Iohannes, se wæs ealra manna se mæsta ond se halgosta to Criste seluum, ond he wæs heafde becorfen for scandfulra wifa bene, ond for geonlices mægdenes plegan, ond scondfulles gebeorscypes hleahtre, ond for druncenes kyninges wordum, buton efne forþon god hine forlet in þisse nyþerlican worulde swa forslegenlice ond swa orwyrþlicne deð þrowian, ðæt he hine wolde in ðære hean worulde gelædan to þam wuldre þæt ænig mon ne mæg monum areccan?
Forþon Herodes het beran þæt heafod on þam dissce, forðam þe wæs kyninga dohtro þeaw, ðonne hi plegodon mid gyldenum applum on selfrenum disce.
On þone ilcan dæg bið þære fæmnan tid sancta Sabine in Rome, þære mæsse bið gemeted on þam niwran bocum.
On þone XXXan dæg þæs monðes bið þæs bisceopes gemynd sancti Felicis.
Wæs in ðære ceastre þe is nemned Tubsocensi.
Þa het Dioclitianus se kasere þære ceastre gerefa þæt he gename on þam biscope ealle godes bec ond forbærnde.
Þa nolde se bisceop ða bec syllan, ac cwæþ, Selre is ðæt man me selfne bærne þonne ða godcundan gewritu.
Þa het se dema hine to oþrum reþran deman mid his preostum.
Swa he wæs onsended on monige healfe to missenlicum demum, ond æghwylc hine þreatode æfter ðam godes bocum, oþ þæt he becom in þa ceastre þe is nemned Venusio, sio is on þam lande Apulie.
Þa þreatode þære burge gerefa æfter þam bocum, þa cwæþ he.
Ic hi hæbbe, ac ic hi nelle syllan.
Þa het se hine lædan to þære beheafduncga mid his preostum.
On æfænne hine man beheafdode, ond on ða ilcan tid wæs se mona in blod gecyrred.
His mæssepreost þreowude mid him, þæs nama wes Ianuarius, ond his leorneras twegen, ða wæron nemnede Furtunatus ond Septimus.
On ðone XXXI deg þæs monðes biþ sancte Aidanis geleornis ðæs bisceopes, þæs saule geseah sancte Cuthberhtus on midde niht englas læddan micle leohte to heofonum.
Se bisceop wæs Scyttisc, ond sancte Oswald, se halga cyning, hine begeat on þas ðeode.
Ond he dyde fela wundra ge lifgende ge geleored, ond his ban syndon healfe on Scottum, healfe on Glæstingabyrig on sancta Marian mynstre.
Ðonne se monaþ biþ geendod þe we nemnaþ weodmonaþ, þonne bið seo niht X tida lang ond se dæg XIIII tida.
On ðæm nigoþan monþe on geare biþ XXX daga.
Se monaþ hatte on leden Septembris ond on ure geþeode haligmonaþ, forþon þe ure yldran, þa þa hi hæþene wæron, on þam monþe hi guldon hiora deofolgeldum.
On ðone ærestan dæg ðæs monþes biþ þæs martyris tid sancti Prisci, ðæs mæsse biþ gemeted on þam yldran mæssebocum.
On ðone æfteran dæg þæs monþes biþ ðæs halgan weres gemynd þæs nama is sanctus Antonius, se wæs in Assiria mægþe on þære ceastre Apameno.
He wæs Cristen læce, ond he eardode in hæþenra midlene swa swa rose sio wyrt biþ on þorna midlynæ, ond he lærde men geornlice to godes geleafan.
Ða feodon hine þa hæþnan forþon ond hine ofslogon ðær ond tocurfon þone lichaman on manugu sticceo ond awurpon in þæt wæter þe þær fleow in þa burh Apamenam.
Þa gesomnodon þa sticceo hi in þa þruh þurh þa ðe þæt wæter fleow.
Ða ne meahte þæt wæter flowan, ond hwæþere þeah ne meahte nænig mon ðone lichoman findan, ærþon þe comon twa wif geleaffulle ond hine atugon of þam wætere, ond hine þa sum mæssepreost bebyrgde.
Ond syþðan wæron æt þam lichoman swa micle <wundor> þæt þa þe hine cwealdon for þam wundrum wæron gecyrred to godes geleafan.
On ðone þryddan dæg þæs monþes biþ þæs bisceopes tid sancti Aristome ond þara martyra sancte Paterniane ond sancti Feliciani.
On ðoneIIIIdæg þæs monþes biþ þæs martyres tid sancti Marcelli.
Se becom on wege to Prisce þam hæþnan gerefan þær he deofolgeldum geald.
Þa laþode he hine to his symble.
Ða sæde Marcellus him þæt he wære cristen, ond him nære alyfed þæt he birgde þara hæþenra symbles.

Þa yrsede Priscus se gerefa ond het adelfan seaþ oþ gyrdyls deopne, ond he bebead þone godes wer þæt mon hine bebyrgde in þam seaðe oþ þone gyrdels, þæt him lifiendum were þæt to wite þæt þam forþweardan men biþ to reste.
Ond he þa þurhwunode swa in þam seaðe ðry dagas lifgende in godes lofsongum, ond þa ageaf ðone clænan gast ond þæs lichaman insmoh forlet monnum to mundbyrde.
Se resteþ in þære byrig Cabilonenti.
<On> ðone Van dæg þæs monðes biþ ðæs godes andetteres tid sancti Guinti, þæs mæsse bið gemeted on þam yldrum mæssebocum.
On ðone ylcan dæg byþ ðæs halgan abbodes geleornes Berhtinus.
He gesenode an wines ful ond onsende sumum mærum were, se afeol of his horse ofer stænene eorþan, ond him wæron þa limo gecnyssed ond þæt þeoh forod.
Ond sona swa he þæs wines onbyrgde he wæs hal geworden.
Ðises arwurþan abbodes lichoma is geseted in þam mynstre Sithio.
Ðone lichoman gesohte sum deaf man ond feþeleas.
Ofer þone man becom færinga godcund wracu, forþam þe he ficsode on sunnan niht, þæt he seþþan ne meahte ne gehyran ne gangan.
Ac he gecreap in þæs eadgan Berhtinus ciricean sume sunnan uhtan, þa ðær man rædde þa nigoþan rædinge on Cristes godspelle.
Þa meahte he gehyran ond gangan, ond he ferde bliþe tu his huse.
On ðone VII dæg ðæs monþes biþ þæs martyres tid sancti Synoti, þæs mæsse biþ gemeted on þam yldrum mæssebocum.
On ðone VIIIan dæg þæs monþes byð sancta Marian acennednes.
Hyre fæder wæs nemned Ioachim ond hire modor Anna, ond hi wæron XX geara somod ærþon þe hi bearn hæfdon.
Þa wæron swiþe unrote.
Þa oþywde godes engel hiora ægðrum onsundrum hine ond him sæde ðæt hi sceoldon <habban> swylc bearn swylce næfre ær in worold come ne ær ne eft.
Ða efter XX gearum cende Anna, ond hieo nemde þa Maria.
Ond þa hio wæs þreo geara eald, ða læddon hi fæder ond modor to Hierusalem ond sealdon hi þer in þara fæmnena gemænnesse.
Þa wæs þæt cild sona snotor ond anræde ond swa fulfremed þæt nænig æþelicor ne sang þone godes lofsang, ond hio wæs swa beorht on ansyne ond wliti þæt mon hyre meahte uneaþe onlocyan.
Ond on hyre mægdenhade hio dyde fela wundra on webgeweorce ond oþrum cræftum ðæs þe þa yldran don ne meahton.
On ðone ylcan dæg byþ þæs bisceopes geleorudnes sancti Audomari, se dyde monig heofonlic wundor ge lybbende ge unlybbende.
Þa he his gast asende, þa wæs in þam huse wynsum stenc, swa hit wære mid eallum deorweorþum wyrtum gefylled, ond his lichama resteð in Sithio þam mynstre.
Ond his wundra wæs sum ðæt sum mon sealde oþrum scilling seolfres to borge.
Þa onsoc se oþer eft ond cwæþ þæt he him nan feoh ne sealde.
Ða cwæþ se þe ðæt seolfor ahte; Uton gangan to Audomares ciricean, ond me þær gecyþ mid aþe þæt þu me her wiðsæcest.
Þa eodon hi oþ þæt hi gesawon þa ciricean.
Ða cwæð se se þæs feos manode, God biþ æghwær ondweard.
Swere me her þæt wit standaþ.
Þa wolde he swerian.
Þa feol he sona niþerweard on þa eorþan, ond him toburston ða eagan, ond he lifde twegen dagas ofer þæt oþrum monnum to brogan, ond þy þryddan dæge he swealt mid earmlicum deaþe.
On ðone XI dæg þæs monþes biþ ðara haligra wera tid sancti Proti ond sancti Iacinthi.
Þæt wæron Eugenian þegenas ðære æþelan fæmnan, ond hio onfengon fulwihte mid hire.
Ond þa on Galienus dagum þæs kaseres het Necetius, Romeburge gerefa, hi lædan to þures deofulgeldum ond het hi þæt weorðian.
Ða dydon hi gebed to Drihtne, þa feol þæt deofolgild to hyra fotum ond wearþ eal tobrocen.
Þa het se refa hi forðæm beheafdian, ond hi wæron Cristes martyras gefremede.
On ðone XIIII dæg þæs monþes biþ ðæs bisceopes ðrowung sancti Corneli in Rome.
Ðone nydde Decius se kasere deofolgeld to begangenne.
Þa he þæt ne geþafode, þa het he hine lædan to beheafdunga.
Ða he þa læded wæs, þa gehælde he sumes cempan wif mid his gebede, seo wæs ær fif gear loma.
Þæs cempan noma wæs Cerealis, ond þæs wifes nama wæs Salustia.
Ond he geþrowode martirdom mid an twentigum mannum, ond se cempa mid his wife.
On ðone ylcan dæg biþ sancte Ciprianes tid þæs bisceopes, se wæs in Kartagine þære ceastre, ond he þrowode martyrdom on Valerianus dagum þæs kaseres.
Galerius se aldorman, beforan him he het arædan þæs kaseres dom þæt he sceolde deofolgeldum geldan oððe sweordes dom þrowian.
Þa se dom aræded wæs, ða andswarode him Ciprianus and cwæþ, gode þanc.
Þa hine man lædde to þære stowe þe hine man beheafdude, ða gesomnode he miclo mænigiu broþra ond sweostra, ond wacedon beforan þam durum ðær he inne wæs.
Ða bebead he þæt mon heolde his mædenu clæne.
Ne gemde he na swa swyðe hu he on morgenne aræfnede ðæs unhyran cwelres hand, swa he þæs gymde hu he godes ywde gescylde oþ þone ytemystan dæg his lifes.
Þa on morgenne ða aræfnode he þa beheafdunga, ond he het ðæm cwelre syllan XXV gyldenra myneta.
Ða æfter feaum dagum swealt se ealdorman þe hyne martyrode.
On ðone XV dæg þæs monþes bið sancti Valerianys þrowung ðæs martyres, þone se refa nydde from Cristes geleafan.
Ða he þam wiþsoc, ða het he mid sweorde hine slean.
Þa hine man to þære cwale lædde, ða geseah he mid his eagum openne heofon, ond he geseah Crist sylfne him bringan wuldorbeah ongean, ond he þa þy unforhtlicor ðone deaþ aræfnode.
On ðone ylcan dæg bið ðæs halgan munecys geleornes ond þæs ancran sancti Mamiliani.
Se dyde manega wundru, ond he hælde untrume men mid his gebedum ond he wæs swa gistliþe þæt he for godes lufon eode to reordum mid þam tocumendum mannum.
Þa tælde hine an oferhydig bisceop forþon ond sende his twegen cempan þæt ða sceoldon ðone ancran him to gelædan, þæt he ongeate hwylce his ðeawas wæron.
Ða bed he þa cempan þæt hi for godes lufon onfengon gereorde mid him.
Geþafode þæt oþer, ond oðer ðam wiþsoc, se wæs yldra ond oferhydygra.
Ða hi þa eodon on þone weg, ða ongan ðone oferhydygan þyrstan on deaþ.
Ða feol he to ðæs godes þeowes fotum ond him bæd miltse.
Ða geseah se godes þeow an wilde hinde melce.
Þa gesenode he hi, ða gestod heo, ond se geþyrsta mon meolcode ða hinde ond dranc þa meolc, ond his ðurst wæs geliþad.
Þa lattowas swiþe for <ðam> wundrum.
Þa he com to þam oferhydigan bisceope, þa wæs ðær broht to fulwihte niwan acenned cild.
Þa het se bisceop hine fullian þæt cild.
Þa cwæþ he, Hwæs sunu is hit?
Þa cwæþ se bisceop, Mines hereteman.
Þa locode sanctus Mamilium on þæt cild ond cwæþ, Saga me hwa þin fæder sy.
Ða cwæþ þæt cild, þes bisceop þe her stent.
Ða gerehte þæt cild beforan þam bisceope sancti Mamiliani hu hit wæs gestryned ðurh ðæs bisceopes unrihthæmed.
Ða <gefullde> <he> ðæt cild ond þa demde he ðam bisceope for his dyrnum geligrum, se ðohte ær þæt he sceolde him deman, forþon þe he for godes lufon æt mid geswencedum monnum.
On ðone XVIan dæg þæs monþes bið ðrowung sancta Eufemia, seo ðrowode mærne martyrdom for Criste in Calcidonia þære ceastre on Dioclitianus dagum þæs kaseres.
Priscus se ealdormon geresde on þa fæmnan in cristenmonna midle, swa wullf <geræseð> on sceap on miclum ewede, ond he nydde hi þæt heo Criste wiðsoce.
Þa heo þæt ne geþafode, ða het he hi weorpan in byrnendne ofen.
Ða cwæþ þara ðegna sum, se wæs on naman Sustenis, ær ic me sylfne ofslea mid mine sweorde, ærþon ic sende mine hond on þas fæmnan.
Ic geseo beort werod mid hire.
Ða ongyrde oþer þegn þa fæmnan, se wæs on noman Victor.
Ða cwæþ se, Eala, ealdormon, ðis me is hefi to donne.
Ic geseo fægere weras stondan in ðisses ofnes muþe, þa <tostredað> þone lig þæt he ne mæg na sceðþan þisse fæmnan.
Þa genamon oþre twegen þa fæmnan ond wurpon in ðone ofn.
Þa eode se lig of þam ofne ond forbærnde hi begen, ond hire he ne sceþede.
Þisse fæmnan lichoma restet neah Calcidonia þære ceastre, ond ure fædras hi nemdon þa sigefæstan fæmnan.
On ðone XVIIIIan dæg þæs monþes bið þæs bisceopes gemynd sancti Ianuari.
Se þrowode martyrdom for Criste in ðære ceastre Beneuentum ond his deaconas mid him, þa wæron on noman sanctus Festus ond sanctus Desiderius.
On þone XX dæg þæs monþes bið þære fæmnan gemynd sancta Fausta ond sancti Efilasi.
Þæt wæs se gerefa se þe <geheold> þa witu þa se casere het don þære halgan fæmnan Faustan.
Þa gelyfde he gode for þam wundrum ða he þa geseah æt hire, ond he ða geþrowode martyrdom mid hire.
On ðone XXI dæg þæs monþes bið þæs apostoles tid sanctus Matheus.
Se wæs ærest mid Iudeum theloniarius, þæt is gafoles moniend ond wicgerefa, ac Crist hine ceas him to þegene.
Ond he wrat ealra manna<../images/etail.gif>rest Cristes godspel mid Iudeum.

Ond æfter Cristes upastignesse he gelærde twua mægþa to godes geleafan, Macedonian þa mægðe ond Sigelwara mægðe, ond of <Sigalwarum> he flymde <twegen> dryas, ða þar worhton micel scinlac mid twam dracum, ond he awehte hira cyninges sunu of deaþe ond þone cyning gefulwade þæs nama wæs Eilippus, ond his quene noma wæs Eufenisse.
Ac hwæðre oþer kyning wæs æfter þam, se wæs on naman Hirtacus.
He het þisne Matheum hindan mid sweorde þurhstingan, þær he stod ætforan godes weofode in gebede, forðæm þe he ne moste ane godes fæmnan, þæt wæs an nunne, him to wife onfon.
Ac Matheus him sægde þæt he wære swa synnig wið god, gif he ða gehalgodan fæmnan to legerteame onfenge, swa se ðeow wære se ðe fenge on kyninges quene to unryhtum hæmde.

Ond ða sona æfter Matheus þrowunge þa forborn ðæs cyninges heall mid eallum his spedum, ond his sunu awedde, ond he sylf ahreofode ond tobærst mid wundum from ðam heafde oð ða fet, ond he asette his sweord upweard ond ða hyne sylfne ofstang.
Sanctus Matheus lichoma resteð on Parthora muntum ond bideð þære toweardan æriste.
On ðone XXII dæg þæs monðes bið sancti Maurices ðrowung ond VI þusyndo martyra mid him ond VI hund.
Þæt wæs cempena werod þa comon of eastdæle of Campodocia mægðe ðam casere to fultume Maximiane, ond hie wæron swiðe sigefæste weras in eallum gefeohtum.
Ac ða onfand se casere æt nehstan þæt hie wæron cristene.
Ða het he hy gemartyrian þæt heora þæt halige blod orn æfter eorðan swa swa flod.
Nyton we heora monena na ma þonne sanctus Mauricius, se wæs ðæs werodes ealdorman, ond sanctus Exuprius ond sanctus Candidus.
Þa oðra noman syndon awritene on heofenum on lifes bocum.
On ðone XXIII dæg þæs monðes bið ðæs diacones gemynd se is nemned sancti Sossy.
He wæs in ðære ceastre Meselana, ond sume dæge þa he rædde godspell æt mæssan, ða scan him heofonlic leoht ymb ðæt heafod.
Ða cwæð se biscop se ðe his lareow wæs, Ne bið þes diacon noht longe mid us, ac he sceal beon mid Criste.
Ond þa æfter feawa dagum ða endode he his lif þurh martyrhad for Criste.
On ðone ilcan dæg bið sancte Teclan tid þære halgan fæmnan.
Seo wæs in ðære ceastre Ioconio, ond heo wæs ðær beweddedo æðelum brydguman.
Ða gehyrde heo Paules lare ðæs apostoles, ða gelyfde heo gode ond awunode in hyre mægðhade.
Ond forðon heo arefnde monigu witu.
Hy mon wearp in byrnende fyr, ond hio nolde byrnan, ond hy mon sende in wildra deora menigo, in leona ond in berena, ond ða hie noldon slitan.
Hy mon wearp in sædeora seað, ond þa hyre ne sceðedon.
Hy mon band on wilde fearras, ond ða hyre ne geegledon.
Ond ða æt neahstan heo scear hyre feax swa swa weras ond gegyrede hy mid weres hrægle ond ferde mid Paulum, þam godes ærendracan.
Tecle wæs swa myhtigu fæmne þæt heo geðingode to gode sumre hæðenre fæmnan gæste hwylce hwegu ræste in ðære æcan worulde.
On ðone XXIIII dæg þæs monðes bið sancti Iohannis geeacnung þæs miclan fulwihteres.

Ðy dæge Gabriel se heahengel æteowde Zacharie, Iohannis fæder, þær he stod æt ðam weofode ond ricels bærnde in godes ansægdnesse, ond him sægde þæt him scolde beon <sunu> <acenned>, <and> <þæs> <nama> <sceolde> Iohannis gecigged.
Þa nolde Zacharias ðam engle gelyfan ond his wife on heora yldo meahte beon sunu acenned.
Þa cwæð se engel to him, ðu bist dumb oð þone dæg oð ðæt ðe þis bið.
Ond hit ða wæs swa geworden.
On ðone ilcan dæg bið þara haligra wera tid sancti Andochi þæs mæssepreostes ond sancti Tyrsi þæs diacones.

Ða comon of eastdæle in Galwala mægðe ond þær monige men þur fulwiht gelærdon to Cristes geleafan ond ðær geþrowodon martyrdom for godes naman on Aurelianus dagum þæs caseres, ond sum cepemon cristen mid him, ðæs nama wæs Felix.
Æryst se casere him bead gold ond seolfor wið ðon ðe hy forleton Cristes geleafan.
Ða noldon hy ðæt.
Ða het he mid stengum heora sweoran forslean.
Ða leordon þa gastas to ecum gefean, ond æt heora lichoman wæron monug wundru gewordenu.
On ðone XXV dæg þæs monðes bið ðæs <halgan> <weres> <gemind> se wæs on ðisse Brytene, ond he wæs nemned Ceolfrið.
He wæs sumes haliges mynstres abbod be norðan gemære, þæt wæs gehalgod sancte Petre.
Ond ða on his yldo ongan he feran to Rome, ond þrim dagum ærðon þe he ferde he sægde his siðfæt ðæs mynstres broðrum.
Ond siððan he on siðe wæs, he asong ælce dæge tuwa his saltere ond his mæssan, butan ðam anum dæge ðe he on sæ wæs ond þrim dagum ær his endedæge.
He wæs onLXXIIIIgeara þa he forðferde.

Æfter hundteontegum daga ond XIIII þæs ðe he of his mynstre ferde, he geleorde on Burgenda mægðe æt Linguna ceastre, ond he wæs arwyrðlice bebyrged in ðære cirican þe hy nemnað sanctos geminos æt ðam halgum getwinnum mid micle wope ge on Angelcynnes monna ge þiderleodiscra.
Þær his geferscipe hyne todælde on þreo.
An dæl ferde forð to Rome, oðer dæl cyrde eft to Brytene ond þæt sægdon, ond se þridda dæl gesæt æt his byrgenne for his lufan betweoh ða men þe heora geþeodo ne cuðon.
<On> ðone XXVI dæg þæs monðes bið sancta Justinan tid þære fæmnan ond þæs biscopes sancti Cyprianus.
Se Cyprianus wæs æryst ealra dry se wyrsta, ond he wolde þære fæmnan mod on his scincræftum onwendan to hæðendome ond to unclænum hæmede.
Ac ða gedwinon his drycræftas for hyre halignesse swa swa rec þonne he toglideð, oððe weax þonne hit for fyre gemelteð.
Þa forlet he þone drycræft, ond he wæs geworden halig biscop, ond mid þære ilcan fæmnan he þrowode eft martyrdom, ond heora lichoma resteð in ðære ceastre þe is nemned Antiochia.
On ðone XXVII dæg þæs monðes bið þara haligra gebroðra tid sancti Cosme ond sancti Damiani.
Þæt wæron heahlæcas, ond hy lacnodon æghwylce untrumnesse monna, ond hy ne onfengon nowiht æt nænigum men, ne æt weligum ne æt heanum.
Þa gehældon hie sum wif of micelre medtrumnesse.
Ða brohte seo diogollice Sancti Damiane medmicle gretinge.
Gewritu secgað þæt ðæt wære þreo ægero ond heo hyne halsode þurh god þæt he ðam onfenge.
Ða onfeng he ðam.
Þa wæs broðor Cosmas forðam swiðe unrot, ond forðam he bebead þæt mon heora lichoman ætsomne ne brygde æt heora ende.
Ða on ðære ilcan niht ætywde ure dryhtæn Cosme ond cwæð, Forhwon spræce þu swa for ðære gretinge þe Damianus onfeng?
Ne onfeng he ðæt na to medsceatte, ac forðon þe he wæs þyr me gehalsod.
Ðas gebroðor geþrowedon mærne martyrdom on Diaclitianus dagum ðæs caseres from Lissia þam gerefan.
Hy wæron stæned, ond ða stanas wæron on bæc gecyrred ond wundedon ða þe ða halgan stændon.
Hy wæron mid strælum scotode, ac ða strælas forcyrdon hy ond slogon ða hæðnan, ac ðurh beheafdunga hy onsendon heora gast to gode.
Ða ðohton ða men þa ðe heora lichoman namon hwæðer hy mon ætsomne byrgde, forðon ðe Cosmas þæt ær forbead.
Þa com ðær yrnan sum olbenda, ond se cwæð mid menniscre stefne, Ne todælað ge ðara haligra lichoman, ac byrgað hy ætsomne.
Ða dydon hy swa him þæt dumbe neat onwreah, ond þeah siððan gelumpon heofonlico wundru þurh ðara haligra mægen.
On ðone XXVIIII dæg þæs monðes bið Sancte Michahelis cirican gehalgung in Tracla þære ceastre.
In Eracle ðære mægðe feonda menigo com to þære ceastre ond hy ymbsæton.
Þa ceasterware þurh þreora daga fæsten anmodlice bædon fultumes ond bædon þæt he him þone ætywde þurh sancte Michahel.
Ða ðy þriddan dæge stod sanctus Michahel ofer ðære ceastre gete ond hæfde fyren sweord in his honda.
Þa wæron ða fynd abregede mid þy egesan, ond hy gewiton onweg, ond þa ceasterwara wunedon gesunde.
Ond þær wæs getimbred sancte Michaheles cirice, ond seo wæs gehalgod on ðone dæg þe we mærsiað sancte Michaheles gemynd.
On ðone XXX dæg þæs monðes bið Hieronimis tid þæs mæssepreostes ond þæs æðelan leorneres.
Se wæs in Bethlem in ðære Iudiscan ceastre.
Be ðam sagað sanctus Arculfus þæt he gesawe medmicle cirican butan Bethlem þære ceastre, in ðære wæs geseted byrnende leohtfæt ge dæges ge nihtes.
Ðonne se mona bið geendud ðe we nemnað haligmonoð, þonne bið seo niht XII tida long, ond se dæg bið þæt ilce.
On ðam teoðan monðe on geare bið XXXI daga.
Þone mon nemneð on leden Octember ond on ure geðeode winterfylleð.
On þone ðriddan dæg þæs monðes bið þara preosta þrowung þa wæron begen anes noman.
Oðer wæs se blaca Heawold, oðer se hwita Heawold.
Ða mæssepreostas ferdon of ðisse Brytene east ofer sæ to Frysum ond ða lærdon to godes geleafan ond ðær geðrowodon martyrdom for Criste, ond heofonlic leoht wæs gesewen ofer heora lichoman.
Hyra wundor synt awriten on Angolcynnes bocum, ðæt is on istoria Anglorum.
On ðone VII dæg þæs monðes bið þæs papan tid þæs noma wæs sanctus Marcus.
Se wæs on <Constantynus> dagum þæs caseres, ond his lichoma wæs bebyrged ond is in ðam mynstre þe hy nemnað æt Rome Balbino.
On ðone VIII dæg þæs monðes bið ðæs biscopes tid ond þæs halgan martyres sancti Dionisi ond his diacona twega þara noman wæron Rusticus ond Eleutherius.
Ða wæron in ðære ceastre ðe Parisius is nemned.
Þær hy mon nydde þæt hy deofulgyld weorðedon.
Ða hy þæt ne geðafedon, ða wæron for Criste gemartyrod.
Ða woldon ða cwelleras sendan heora lichoman on deopne stream, on ða ea þe hatte Secuana.
Ac ða sum Cristen wif hy laðode to symble, ond hy ða hyre getæhton þara haligra lichoman, ond hio ða het hyre men on niht þa lichoman forstelan ond bebyrgan on hyre æcere.
Ond se æcer þa syððan gegreowCsiða selor þonne he ær dyde.
Þær æfter ðon cristene men timbredon cirican, ond ðær blinde men onfengon heora gesyhðe ond healte heora gonge ond deafe gehyrnesse.
On ðone endlyftan dæg þæs monðes bið þære halgan abbodissan forðfor ond ðære æðelan fæmnan þære noma wæs sancta æðylburh.
Sio gestaðelode ðæt fæmna mynster on Brytene þæt is nemned on Bercingum, ond on hyre dagum gelumpon heofonlicu wundro on ðam ilcan mynstre.
Ond sum halig fæmne geseah þære ilcan æðylburge gast mid gyldenum racenteagum beon getogen to heofenum.
Hyre wundro ond hyre mynstres syndon awriten on Angolcynnes bocum.
On ðone XIIII dæg þæs monðes bið sancti Calistis gemynd þæs papan.
Se þrowode martyrdom for Criste on ðæs caseres dagum se wæs nemned Macrini, ond he is bebyrged in ðam mynstre Calepode on ðam wege þe æt Rome is nemned Aurelia.
Þes papa gesette on Rome þreora sæternesdaga fæsten on geare, ænne for hwætes genihtsumnesse, oðerne for wines, þriddan for eles.
On ðone XV dæg þæs monðes bið þæs martyres tid sancti Lupuli, þæs mæsse bið gemeted on ðam yldran mæssebocum.
On ðone XVIII dæg þæs monðes bið sancte Lucas geleornes ðæs godspelleres.
Se wrat ðone þriddan dæl Cristes boca in Achaia ðære mægðe, ond he wrat ða maran bocActus Apostolorum.
Lucas wæs acenned in Siria mægðe, ond he wæs æryst cræftig læce in Antiochia þære ceastre, ond he wæs eft Paulus gefera in ælce elðeodignesse, ond he wæs se clænosta wer.
Næs he hæbbende wif ne bearn.
He gefor þa he wæs onLXXVIIgeara, ond he wæs æryst bebyrged in Bethania ac his ban wæron eft alæded þanon on Constantines dagum þæs caseres in ða ceastre Constantinopili.
On ðone ilcan dæg bið þære halgan cwene gemynd sancta Trifonia.
Seo wæs Decies cwen þæs caseres, ond heo wæs æryst hæðen ond wælgrim.
Ac heo geseah hu Decius se casere wedde ond hrymde dæges ond nihtes, ærðon he dead wære.
Þa gelyfde heo on god ond onfeng fulwihte, ond sume dæge ðær heo hy gebæd heo onsende hyre gast to gode.
On ðone ilcan dæg bið þæs halgan cnihtes þrowung sancti Iusti, se wæs VIII wintre þa he martyrdom þrowode for Criste.
Þone het beheafdian sum rice mon, se wæs on naman Ritsoalis.
Ða woldon þa cwelleras niman þæt heafod ond lædan to ðam rican men.
Þa aras se lichoma ond genam þæt heafod him on ond seo tunge spræc of ðæm heafde ond cwæð þus, Heofones God ond eorðan, onfoh mine sawle, forðon ic wæs unsceðþende ond clænheort.
Þa gemette hine þær his fæder ond his fædera swa beheafdodne.
Ða cwædon hi, Hwæt wille wit don be ðissum lichoman?
Ða spræc seo tunge eft of ðam heafde ond cwæð, Gongað on ðis stanscræf ðæt her neah is, ond git þær metað weal se is mid ifige bewrigen.
Bedelfað on ðam þone lichoman ond sendað min heafod an to gretinge ond bringað minre meder þæt heo ðæt cysse.
Ond gif heo me geseon wylle, ðonne sece heo me in godes neorxnawonge.
Þa bedulfon hy ðone lichoman þær he ær bebead, ond brohton his heafod in ða ceastre seo hatte Alticiotrum to his meder, þære noma wæs Feliciæ, ond his fæder noma wæs Iustinus.
Þa on niht scan leoht ofer ealle ða ceastre of ðam heafde.
Ða on mergen com se biscop þæder ond þa ceasterwara ealle mid leohtfatum ond mid candelum, ond bæron þæt heafod to cirican ond hit ðær asetton.
Ond ðær georn XVI wintre mæden to ðære bære, seo wæs blind acenned, ond heo meahte sona geseon.
On ðone XVIIII dæg þæs monðes bið sancta Pilagian geleornes þære godes þeowenne.
Seo wæs æryst mima in Antiochia þære ceastre, þæt is scericge on urum geðeode.
Seo glengde hi swa þætte noht næs on hyre gesewen buton gold ond gimmas, ond eall hyre gyrela stanc swa ælces cynnes ricels.
Þa gecyrde heo æne into cirican þær Nonnus se biscop sægde godspel be ðam toweardan godes lombe.
Ða weop heo sona swa ðæt hyre fleowon þa tearas of ðam eagum swa swa flod, ond ða ðy ilcan dæge gesohte heo þone biscop ond cwæð to him, Ic eom deofles ðinen.
Ic yðgode mid synnum swa sæ mid yðum.
Ic wæs synna georn, ond in deaðlicum listum.
Ic wæs beswicen ond ic beswac monige þurh me.
Ac gefulla me þæt mine synna syn adilgode.
Þa gefullode se biscop hy ond hyre gesealde husl, ond æt ðam fulwihte hyre onfeng sum godes þeow þære noma wæs Romana.

Þæs ða ymb twegen dagas, þær heo slep æt ðære godmodor huse, þa com hyre deofol to ond hy awehte ond cwæð to hyre, Min hlæfdige, gif ðe wæs gold to lytel oððe seolfor oððe deorwyrðra gimma oððe ænigra <woruldwelena>, ic ðæt sona gebete, ac ne forlæt me.
Ða cwæð heo, Ic ðe wiðsace, forðon ic eom nu in Cristes bure.

Þa on ðære eahtoðan nihte hyre fulwihtes þa gegyrede heo hy mid hærenre tunecan ond mid byrnan þæt is mid lytelre hacelan, ond heo næs na leng ðær gesewen, ac heo gewat on Oliuetes dune ond hyre timbrede lytle cytan in ðære stowe þe Crist him gebæd þa he wæs mon on eorðan.
Þær hio wunode þreo gear, þæt nænig mon wiste hwæðer hio wæs wer ðe wif, ærðon ðe heo forðfered wæs.
Ða onfand se biscop on Hierusalem þær he hyre lichoman gyrede þæt heo wæs wif.
Ða cwæð he, God, þe sy wuldor.
Ðu hafast monigne haligne ofer eorðan ahyded.
On ðon XXI dæg þæs monðes bið þæs halgan fæder geleornes sancti Hilariones.
Se wæs upcymen in Palistina mægðe in ðam tune ðe is nemned Ðabata, ond he wæs sona on his cnihthade on gewritum gelæred.
Ond he gewat in westen þa he wæs XVI wintræ, ond þær hyne dioflu costodon in mislicum hywum.

Hwilum hy him raredon on swa hryðro, hwilum hy him lægon big swilce nacode wifmen, hwilum hy æteowdon him swa swa þeotende wulf, hwilum swa beorcende fox, ond he ðæt eall oferswiðde þurh Cristes miht ond dyde unrim heofonlicra wundra.
Ðara wæs sum þæt sum geong mon bæd sume gode fæmnan unrihthæmedes.
Þa heo þæt ne geþafode, ða agrof se mon on ærenum brede drycræftæs word ond bedealf under þone þerscwold þæs huses þær seo fæmne ineode. ond þa sona swa heo ineode, þa wæs heo of hyre ryhtgewitte.
Ac heo cleopode to ðam geongan be his naman.
Þa gelæddon yldran hy to sancti Hilarione.
Þa hrymde ðæt deoful in ðære fæmnan ond cwæð to him, þu me nedest to utgonge, ond ic ne mæg, buton me se geonga læte se me under ðam þerscwolde geband.
Þa cwæð se godes wer to ðam deofle, Tohwon eodest ðu in ðis godes mægden?
Forhwon noldest ðu gongan in ðone mon þe ðe in hy sende?
Þa cwæð ðæt <deofu>, he hæfde minne geferan in him, ðæt deofol ðe hyne lærde ða unclænan lufan.
Ða geclænsode se Godes wer ða fæmnan for ðon scindlacum.
Ða sanctus Hilarion wæs onLXXXmwintrum, þa he forðferde.
Ond þy dæge þe he geleorde, he cwæð to him sylfum, Gong ut, sawl, hwæt drædest ðu ðe?
Gong ut, hwæt tweost ðu ðe nu?
Hundseofontig geara þu þeowodest gode, ond nu gyt þone deað þe ondrædest?
Ond æt ðissum worde he onsende his gast, ond his lichoma is in Palestina mægðe in ðære stowe þa hatte Maiuma.
On ðone XXIIII dæg þæs monðes bið ðæs martyres tid þrowung sancti Genesi, ðone mon acwealde, forðon ðe he nolde deofulgild weorðian.
Þæs gemynd is mycel on twam burgum on twa healfa þæs flodes ðe hatte Rodanum, þæt is on ure geðeode Rodena mere.
In oðre birg is seo stow þe he mid his blode gehalgode þa hyne mon martyrode, in ðære birg is his lichoma geseted.
On ðone ilcan dæg bið XVI cempena tid, ða het Claudius se casere heafde beceorfan in ðære <ceastre> Figligna, forðon ðe hy fulwihte onfengon.
Ond hie wæron bliðran to ðam deaðe þonne hy her on hæðengilde lifden.
Þara cempenaIIIIwæron nemned þiosius ond Lucius ond Marcus ond Petrus.
On ðone XXVI dæg þæs monðes bið sancte Ceadweallan geleornes þæs biscopes.
He wæs Ceaddan broðor, ond sum halig mon geseah þæt he lædde Ceaddan sawle mid englum to heofenum.
Ceadde wæs biscop in Eastseaxum, ond hwæðere his lichoma resteð be norðan gemære in ðam mynstre Læstinga ea, ond his dæda wæron awritene on Angolcynnes bocum.
On ðone XXVIII dæg þæs monðes þara apostola tid Simonis ond Thaddeos.
Simonis wæs sancta Marian swystorsunu, Cristes modrian sunu, seo wæs nemned on Cristesbocum Maria cleopode.
Þonne wæs Thaddeos oðer noma Iudas.
Ðas apostolas æfter Cristes upastigenesse gewiton on Persida mægðe ond bodedon Cristes geleafan ond dydon unrim wundra on ðæs cyninges dagum se wæs nemned Exerses.
Þær hy gedydon ðæt cild sprecende þæt ne wæs anre nihte eald.
Simones lichoma resteð on ðam lande Bosfore, ond Thaddeos lichoma in Armenia mægðe in ðære ceastre Nerita.
On ðone ilcan dæg bið sancta Cyrillan þrowung þære fæmnan.
Seo wæs Decies dohtor þæs caseres, <ac> Claudius se casere hy nydde þæt heo deofolgild herede.
Þa heo ðon wiðsoc, ða het he hy mid sweorde ofstingan ond hyre lichoman weorpan hundum.
Ða Iustinus se mæssepreost genom þone lichoman on niht ond bebyrigde mid oðrum halgum monnum.
On ðone XXXIan dæg þæs <monðes> bið sancti Guintines ðrowung þæs martyres.
Se com of Rome in Galwalas in ða ceastre Ambeanis, ðær Riciouarus se gerefa mid miclum witum hyne nydde to hæðengylde.
Ða he ðæt ne geðafode, ða het he hyne beheafdian.
Fleah on ðam lichoman culfre swa hwit swa snaw, ond seo fleah to heofenum.
Ða het se gerefa weorpan his lichoman in ða ea ðe Sumena is nemned, ond þæt heafod þærto.
Ond æfterLVgeara godes engel getæhte sumum geleaffullan wife, seo wæs nemned Eusebia, ða stowe hwær se lichoma wæs.
Ond ða gebead heo hyre on ðam ofre.
Ða ahleop se lichoma sona up of ðam wætere, ond þæt heafod on oðre stowe.
Ond se lichoma stanc ond þæt heafod swa swote swa rosan blostma ond lilian.
Ond þæt wif heo ða arwyrðlice bebyrgde, ond ealle ða untruman men þa ðe þyder comon to hy wæron sona hale.
Þonne se mona bið geendod ðe we nemnað winterfylleð, þonne bið seo niht XIIII tida long, ond se dæg tyna.
On ðam endlyftan monðe on geare bið XXX daga.

Se monoð is nemned on læden Novembres ond on ure geðeode blodmonað, forðon ure yldran, ða hy hæðenne wæron on ðam monðe hy bleoton a, þæt is þæt hy betæhton ond benæmdon hyra deofolgyldum ða neat þa ðe hy woldon syllan.
On ðone ærystan dæg þæs <monðes> bið ealra haligra tid.
<Þa> <tid> æryst gesette Bonefacius se papa on Rome, mydþy þe he on ðone dæg gehalgode to cirican sancta Marian ond eallum Cristes martyrum ðæt deofolgylda hus þæt hy nemnað Pantheon.
In ðam Romane guldon ða hy hæðene wæron eallum heora deofolgyldum, ond siððan hy cristene wæron, hy ðær weorðedon eallra haligra gemynd.
Ond se papa ða bebead þæt æghwylce geare se dæg in godes ciricum in cristenum folcum wære on swylcre arwyrðnesse swylce se ærysta dæg in natale domini, þæt is ærysta geohheldæg.
On ðon ilcan dæg bið þæs diacones tid sancti Cesari, se ðrowode martyrdom on Aurelianus dagum þæs caseres.
Ðone Leontinus se ealdormon het adrencan in strongum streame for Cristes geleafan.
Ond þæt wæs gewrecen on ðone ilcan dæg.
Se ealdormon rad þurh sumne wudu.
Þa ræsde an næddre of holum treowe æt ðam healsetan him on ðone bosm ond hyne toslat þæt he wæs sona dead.
On ðone ilcan dæg bið þæs mæssepreostes ðrowung sancti Benigni.
Se com from eastdæle on Galwala mægðe ond eardode in ðam tune þe hatte Spaniaca.
Ða het Aurelianus se casere hyne mid witum þreatian from Cristes geleafan.
Ða he þæt ne geþafode, þa het he hyne belucan in carcerne VI dagas ond VI niht ond XII gehyngrede hundas mid him þæt he wære from ðam tobroden.
Ða wæron him ða hundas milde for godes egesan ond his na ne onhrinon.
Ða ðy VIan dæge het se casere him forslean þone sweoran.
Ða sona com fleogan of ðam carcerne snawhwit culfre, ond seo fleah to heofenum.
Ond ðær com to ðam lichoman swyðe wynsum stenc ond eac fyrhto mid.
Ond sum Cristen wif on niht genam ðone lichoman ond hyne arwyðlice bebyrgde, ond æt ðam wæron siððan oft heofonlico mægen.
On ðone VI dæg þæs monðes bið þæs abbodes geleornes sancti <Wunnoci>.
He wæs ðæs mynstres hlaford ðe be suðe sæ is nemned Wurmhol, ond he wæs hwæðere <swa> <eaðmod> þæt he wolde wyrcan æghwylc ðara weorca þe ðam oðrum broðrum wæs heard ond hefig.
Ond æt nehstan þa he ealdode ond he ne myhte ute wyrcan, þa wolde he grindan mid his halgum hondum þam broðrum to mete Cristes þam þearfendum.
Ða sona þa he þære cweorna nealæhte ond þæt corn þær onlægde þa orn seo cweorn ðurh godcunde miht, ond se abbod beleac ða duru ond stod be ðære cweorna ond song his gebedu.
Ða æt nehstan wæs ðær swylc genihtsumnes meluwes ðæt hy ðæt ealle wundredon hwonon þæt come.
Ða sume dæge an ðara broðra locode in ðæt hus þurh an lytel ðyrel.
Þa gestod seo cweorn sona, ond se mon ablindode.
Ond hyne ða oðre swiðe afyrhte þanon læddon, ond he sægde þam broðrum þæs mynstres ðæt wundor þæt he ðær geseah.
Ond ða oðre dæge onleat he wepende to ðæs abbodes fotum ond him bæd forgifnesse, ond ða gebletsode se abbod his eagan on dryhtnes naman, ond he myhte sona geseon.
On VII dæg þæs monðes bið wintres <fruma>.
Se winter hafað tu ond hundnigontig daga, ond ðonne gongað þa VII steorran up on æfen ond on dægered on setl.

On ðone eahtoðan dæg þæs monðes bið ðara martyra þrowung þe we nemnað on gewritum quattuor coronatorum, þæt is þara gesigefæstan weras feower, þara naman wæron Claudius, Castorius, Simfonianus, Nicostratus.
Ðæt wæronIIIIstancræftigan in Rome.
Þær wæs samod VI hund cræftigena ond XXII ond næron nane oðre him gelice.
Hy gesenedon ælce morgen heora iserngeloman, ond ðonne næron hy na tobrocene, ac hy grofen æghwylcne stan swa se casere geðohte.
Ða wæs ðara cræftigena on naman an Simplicus.
Ða lyfde se goda ond fulwihte onfeng, ond ða siððan dyde he eall ðæt ða oðre dydon.
Þa sealde god þissum V cræftegum maran gyfa þonne ðam oðrum.
Ða wregdon ða oðre cræftigan hy to ðam casere ond sægdon him þæt hy wæron Cristene, ond þæt hy þurh drycræft dydon ða cræftlican weorc, for ðe hy þa weorc senodon mid Cristes rode tacne.
Þa yrsode se casere ond het hy cwice belucan in leadenum cistum ond ða weorpan in flod.
Ond ða æfter XLIIm daga sum cristen mon ateah ða cista up mid þam lichoman ond asette in his hus, ond siððan wæron monegu wundru ðurh ðas halgan weras geworden.
